title: I been having issues with resolution of videos taken by cameras. Sending is fine, receiving is bad.
content:
I thought it was my 3rd party text apps, I use Textra. I tried another 3rd party app and it looks the same when viewing videos through text. 

Videos from my phone's camera are sent just fine on the other persons end when using my camera. 

Just recieving videos are awful and pixelated.
